name: Dynamic Search Interface with Elasticsearch and Automated Report Generation

parameters.formDescription: Search for suspicious transactions in your banking database

parameters.content:
## 🎯 ENTRY POINT
User fills out dynamic search form with:
- Minimum transaction amount
- Time range (1hr to 3 days)
- Optional customer ID filter
- Output format (Text/CSV)

💡 TIP: Form auto-validates required fields!

## 🔧 QUERY BUILDER
Transforms user input into Elasticsearch query:

✅ Converts time ranges:
   "Last 24 Hours" → "now-24h"
   "Last 3 Days" → "now-3d"

✅ Builds filters:
   • Amount >= minimum
   • Timestamp within range
   • Customer ID (if provided)

📊 Output: Ready-to-use ES query + metadata

## 🎯 DATA HUNTER
Searches bank_transactions index for suspicious activity

🔧 Configuration:
   • POST to localhost:9220
   • Uses HTTP Basic Auth
   • Sends JSON query from previous node
   • Returns max 100 results, newest first

⚠️ Note: Requires valid ES credentials!

## 📝 REPORT GENERATOR
Transforms raw ES data into user-friendly reports

🎨 Creates two formats:
   📄 TEXT: Human-readable summary
   📊 CSV: Spreadsheet-ready data export

✨ Features:
   • Auto-generates timestamped filename
   • Converts text to binary for file writing
   • Includes search criteria summary
   • Lists all suspicious transactions

🔄 Output: Content + Binary data ready for file save

## 📁 FILE SAVER
Writes the report to server disk

📍 Location: /tmp/report_YYYY-MM-DD.{txt|csv}
🔧 Uses binary data from Format Report node
✅ File ready for download or further processing

🎯 Perfect for:
   • Audit trails
   • Batch processing
   • Compliance reporting

## 🎯 DYNAMIC SEARCH PIPELINE

User Form → Query Builder → ES Search → Report Format → File Save

⏱️ Typical execution: 2-5 seconds
📊 Handles up to 100 suspicious transactions
🔒 Secure: Uses authenticated ES connection
📁 Output: Timestamped report files in /tmp/

_metadata.name: Dynamic Search Interface with Elasticsearch and Automated Report Generation
